summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2010 CARGO CRAFT EV5101 TRAILER. THE METAL FROM THE DRIVER SIDE LEAF SPRING SHACKLE FELL OFF OF THE FRAME. THE ONLY THING HOLDING THE TRAILER TOGETHER WAS THE STRUCTURE OF THE FRAME. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO AN INDEPENDENT MECHANIC WHO IDENTIFIED THE CAUSE OF THE FAILURE. THE CURRENT AND FAILURE MILEAGES WERE APPROXIMATELY 2,600.
